lui/lei.english: He is very nice.
She has a beautiful voice.
He always eats breakfast late.
She says she will arrive soon.

lui/lei.italian: Lui va a scuola ogni giorno.
lui/lei.english: He goes to school every day.
She can sing very well.
He wants a glass of water.
She has to finish the work.
He knows how to ride a motorcycle.

lui/lei.italian: Lei sta con sua nonna oggi.
lui/lei.english: She is staying with her grandmother today.

lui/lei.italian: Lui vede qualcosa fuori dalla finestra.
lui/lei.english: He sees something outside the window.
She gives music lessons.
He speaks three languages.
She always finds a solution.
He eats a lot at lunch.

lui/lei.italian: Lei prende appunti durante la lezione.
lui/lei.english: She takes notes during the lesson.
He understands Italian perfectly.

lui/lei.italian: Lei mette il cappello quando fa freddo.
lui/lei.english: She puts on a hat when it’s cold.
He goes out every Friday night.
She comes from Milan.
